segments.source_content: ## Installing dependencies

translations.zh-hant: ## 安裝依賴套件

segments.source_content: You will need Node, Watchman, the React Native command line interface, a JDK, and Android Studio.

translations.zh-hant: 您需要安裝 Node、Watchman、React Native 命令行界面、JDK 和 Android Studio。

segments.source_content: While you can use any editor of your choice to develop your app, you will need to install Android Studio in order to set up the necessary tooling to build your React Native app for Android.

translations.zh-hant: 雖然您可以使用任何喜歡的編輯器來開發應用程式，但必須安裝 Android Studio 才能設置建置 React Native Android 應用所需的工具鏈。

segments.source_content: Node & Watchman

translations.zh-hant: Node 與 Watchman

segments.source_content: We recommend installing Node and Watchman using [Homebrew](https://brew.sh/). Run the following commands in a Terminal after installing Homebrew:

translations.zh-hant: 建議使用 [Homebrew](https://brew.sh/) 安裝 Node 和 Watchman。安裝 Homebrew 後，在終端機中執行以下命令：

segments.source_content:
```shell
brew install node
brew install watchman
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_43a8bc7e

segments.source_content: If you have already installed Node on your system, make sure it is Node 18.18 or newer.

translations.zh-hant: 若系統已安裝 Node，請確認版本為 18.18 或更新。

segments.source_content: [Watchman](https://facebook.github.io/watchman) is a tool by Facebook for watching changes in the filesystem. It is highly recommended you install it for better performance.

translations.zh-hant: [Watchman](https://facebook.github.io/watchman) 是 Facebook 開發的檔案系統監控工具。強烈建議安裝以獲得更好的效能。

segments.source_content: Java Development Kit

translations.zh-hant: Java 開發套件 (JDK)

segments.source_content: We recommend installing the OpenJDK distribution called Azul **Zulu** using [Homebrew](https://brew.sh/). Run the following commands in a Terminal after installing Homebrew:

translations.zh-hant: 建議使用 [Homebrew](https://brew.sh/) 安裝 Azul **Zulu** 發行版的 OpenJDK。安裝 Homebrew 後，在終端機中執行以下命令：

segments.source_content:
```shell
brew install --cask zulu@17

# Get path to where cask was installed to double-click installer
brew info --cask zulu@17
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_f2b711c6

segments.source_content: After the JDK installation, add or update your `JAVA_HOME` environment variable in `~/.zshrc` (or in `~/.bash_profile`) .

translations.zh-hant: 安裝 JDK 後，請在 `~/.zshrc`（或 `~/.bash_profile`）中新增或更新 `JAVA_HOME` 環境變數。

segments.source_content: If you used above steps, JDK will likely be located at `/Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/zulu-17.jdk/Contents/Home`:

translations.zh-hant: 若按照上述步驟操作，JDK 預設會安裝在以下路徑：

segments.source_content:
```shell
export JAVA_HOME=/Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/zulu-17.jdk/Contents/Home
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_ef6eebef

segments.source_content: The Zulu OpenJDK distribution offers JDKs for **both Intel and M1 Macs**. This will make sure your builds are faster on M1 Macs compared to using an Intel-based JDK.

translations.zh-hant: Zulu OpenJDK 發行版提供 **同時支援 Intel 和 M1 晶片** 的 JDK。這能確保在 M1 Mac 上的建置速度比使用 Intel 版 JDK 更快。

segments.source_content: If you have already installed JDK on your system, we recommend JDK 17. You may encounter problems using higher JDK versions.

translations.zh-hant: 若系統已安裝 JDK，建議使用 JDK 17 版本。使用更高版本可能會遇到問題。

segments.source_content: Android development environment

translations.zh-hant: Android 開發環境

segments.source_content: Setting up your development environment can be somewhat tedious if you're new to Android development. If you're already familiar with Android development, there are a few things you may need to configure. In either case, please make sure to carefully follow the next few steps.

translations.zh-hant: 如果您是 Android 開發新手，設置開發環境可能會有些繁瑣。若已有相關經驗，則只需調整部分設定。無論哪種情況，請務必仔細遵循後續步驟。

segments.source_content: 1. Install Android Studio

translations.zh-hant: 1. 安裝 Android Studio

segments.source_content: [Download and install Android Studio](https://developer.android.com/studio/index.html). While on Android Studio installation wizard, make sure the boxes next to all of the following items are checked:

translations.zh-hant: [下載並安裝 Android Studio](https://developer.android.com/studio/index.html)。在安裝精靈中，請確保勾選以下所有項目：

segments.source_content:
- `Android SDK`
- `Android SDK Platform`
- `Android Virtual Device`

translations.zh-hant:
- `Android SDK`
- `Android SDK Platform`
- `Android Virtual Device`

segments.source_content: Then, click "Next" to install all of these components.

translations.zh-hant: 接著點擊「Next」安裝這些元件。

segments.source_content: > If the checkboxes are grayed out, you will have a chance to install these components later on.

translations.zh-hant: > 若選項呈灰色不可選，後續仍可安裝這些元件。

segments.source_content: Once setup has finalized and you're presented with the Welcome screen, proceed to the next step.

translations.zh-hant: 完成安裝並顯示歡迎畫面後，請繼續下一步。

segments.source_content: 2. Install the Android SDK

translations.zh-hant: 2. 安裝 Android SDK

segments.source_content: Android Studio installs the latest Android SDK by default. Building a React Native app with native code, however, requires the `Android 14 (UpsideDownCake)` SDK in particular. Additional Android SDKs can be installed through the SDK Manager in Android Studio.

translations.zh-hant: Android Studio 預設會安裝最新版 Android SDK。但使用原生碼建置 React Native 應用需要特定的 `Android 14 (UpsideDownCake)` SDK。可透過 Android Studio 的 SDK 管理器安裝其他版本。

segments.source_content: To do that, open Android Studio, click on "More Actions" button and select "SDK Manager".

translations.zh-hant: 開啟 Android Studio，點擊「More Actions」按鈕並選擇「SDK Manager」。

segments.source_content: ![Android Studio Welcome](/docs/assets/GettingStartedAndroidStudioWelcomeMacOS.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![Android Studio 歡迎畫面](/docs/assets/GettingStartedAndroidStudioWelcomeMacOS.png)

segments.source_content: > The SDK Manager can also be found within the Android Studio "Settings" dialog, under **Languages & Frameworks** → **Android SDK**.

translations.zh-hant: > 也可在 Android Studio 的「Settings」對話框中找到 SDK 管理器，路徑為 **Languages & Frameworks** → **Android SDK**。

segments.source_content: Select the "SDK Platforms" tab from within the SDK Manager, then check the box next to "Show Package Details" in the bottom right corner. Look for and expand the `Android 14 (UpsideDownCake)` entry, then make sure the following items are checked:

translations.zh-hant: 在 SDK 管理器中選擇「SDK Platforms」標籤頁，勾選右下角的「Show Package Details」。找到並展開 `Android 14 (UpsideDownCake)` 項目，確保勾選以下內容：

segments.source_content:
- `Android SDK Platform 34`
- `Intel x86 Atom_64 System Image` or `Google APIs Intel x86 Atom System Image` or (for Apple M1 Silicon) `Google APIs ARM 64 v8a System Image`

translations.zh-hant:
- `Android SDK Platform 34`
- `Intel x86 Atom_64 系統映像檔` 或 `Google APIs Intel x86 Atom 系統映像檔` 或 (適用於 Apple M1 晶片) `Google APIs ARM 64 v8a 系統映像檔`

segments.source_content: Next, select the "SDK Tools" tab and check the box next to "Show Package Details" here as well. Look for and expand the "Android SDK Build-Tools" entry, then make sure that `34.0.0` is selected.

translations.zh-hant: 接著，切換至「SDK Tools」分頁，同樣勾選「顯示套件詳細資訊」。找到並展開「Android SDK Build-Tools」項目，確保已選取 `34.0.0` 版本。

segments.source_content: Finally, click "Apply" to download and install the Android SDK and related build tools.

translations.zh-hant: 最後點擊「Apply」按鈕以下載並安裝 Android SDK 及相關建置工具。

segments.source_content: 3. Configure the ANDROID_HOME environment variable

translations.zh-hant: 3. 設定 ANDROID_HOME 環境變數

segments.source_content: The React Native tools require some environment variables to be set up in order to build apps with native code.

translations.zh-hant: React Native 工具需要設定特定環境變數才能建置包含原生代碼的應用程式。

segments.source_content: Add the following lines to your `~/.zprofile` or `~/.zshrc` (if you are using `bash`, then `~/.bash_profile` or `~/.bashrc`) config file:

translations.zh-hant: 請將以下內容加入您的 `~/.zprofile` 或 `~/.zshrc` 設定檔（若使用 `bash` 則為 `~/.bash_profile` 或 `~/.bashrc`）：

segments.source_content:
```shell
export ANDROID_HOME=$HOME/Library/Android/sdk
export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/emulator
export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_8c3563d3

segments.source_content: Run `source ~/.zprofile` (or `source ~/.bash_profile` for `bash`) to load the config into your current shell. Verify that ANDROID_HOME has been set by running `echo $ANDROID_HOME` and the appropriate directories have been added to your path by running `echo $PATH`.

translations.zh-hant: 執行 `source ~/.zprofile`（或 `source ~/.bash_profile` 適用於 `bash`）以載入設定至當前 shell。透過執行 `echo $ANDROID_HOME` 確認 ANDROID_HOME 已設定，並執行 `echo $PATH` 檢查正確目錄是否已加入路徑。

segments.source_content: > Please make sure you use the correct Android SDK path. You can find the actual location of the SDK in the Android Studio "Settings" dialog, under **Languages & Frameworks** → **Android SDK**.

translations.zh-hant: > 請務必使用正確的 Android SDK 路徑。您可以在 Android Studio 的「Settings」對話框中，於 **Languages & Frameworks** → **Android SDK** 下找到 SDK 的實際位置。

segments.source_content: Preparing the Android device

translations.zh-hant: 準備 Android 裝置

segments.source_content: You will need an Android device to run your React Native Android app. This can be either a physical Android device, or more commonly, you can use an Android Virtual Device which allows you to emulate an Android device on your computer.

translations.zh-hant: 您需要一台 Android 裝置來執行 React Native Android 應用程式。這可以是實體 Android 裝置，或更常見的做法是使用 Android 虛擬裝置（AVD），讓您能在電腦上模擬 Android 裝置。

segments.source_content: Either way, you will need to prepare the device to run Android apps for development.

translations.zh-hant: 無論採用哪種方式，您都需要準備裝置以執行開發用的 Android 應用程式。

segments.source_content: Using a physical device

translations.zh-hant: 使用實體裝置

segments.source_content: If you have a physical Android device, you can use it for development in place of an AVD by plugging it in to your computer using a USB cable and following the instructions [here](running-on-device.md).

translations.zh-hant: 若您擁有實體 Android 裝置，可透過 USB 連接線將其連接至電腦，並依照[此處說明](running-on-device.md)設定，即可用於開發以取代 AVD。

segments.source_content: Using a virtual device

translations.zh-hant: 使用虛擬裝置

segments.source_content: If you use Android Studio to open `./AwesomeProject/android`, you can see the list of available Android Virtual Devices (AVDs) by opening the "AVD Manager" from within Android Studio. Look for an icon that looks like this:

translations.zh-hant: 若透過 Android Studio 開啟 `./AwesomeProject/android`，您可點擊 Android Studio 內的「AVD Manager」圖示（外觀如下）查看可用虛擬裝置清單：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_32dbde37

segments.source_content: If you have recently installed Android Studio, you will likely need to [create a new AVD](https://developer.android.com/studio/run/managing-avds.html). Select "Create Virtual Device...", then pick any Phone from the list and click "Next", then select the **UpsideDownCake** API Level 34 image.

translations.zh-hant: 若您剛安裝 Android Studio，可能需要[建立新 AVD](https://developer.android.com/studio/run/managing-avds.html)。選擇「Create Virtual Device...」，從清單中任選一款手機後點擊「Next」，接著選取 **UpsideDownCake** API Level 34 映像檔。

segments.source_content: Click "Next" then "Finish" to create your AVD. At this point you should be able to click on the green triangle button next to your AVD to launch it.

translations.zh-hant: 點擊「Next」後選擇「Finish」即可建立 AVD。此時您應能點擊 AVD 旁的綠色三角形按鈕來啟動模擬器。

segments.source_content: That's it!

translations.zh-hant: 大功告成！

segments.source_content: Congratulations! You successfully set up your development environment.

translations.zh-hant: 恭喜！您已成功設定開發環境。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_97b48ddc

segments.source_content: Now what?

- If you want to add this new React Native code to an existing application, check out the [Integration guide](integration-with-existing-apps.md).
- If you're curious to learn more about React Native, check out the [Introduction to React Native](getting-started).

translations.zh-hant:
- 若想將此 React Native 代碼整合至現有應用程式，請參閱[整合指南](integration-with-existing-apps.md)。
- 若想深入瞭解 React Native，請查看[React Native 簡介](getting-started)。
